techniqueRules: Use high heat for stir-fry, gentle heat for braise.
substitutions: No oyster sauce -> soy + pinch sugar
donts: Avoid low-heat stir-fry that steams ingredients

snippets.text: Chinese home comfort should emphasize balance, not maximum heat or sweetness.
Weeknight Chinese profile should use one-wok or one-pot flow and quick sauces.
Cantonese cues: cleaner seasoning, ginger-scallion aromatics, gentle sauces.
Northern cues: dumpling or noodle comfort, garlic-vinegar accents, wheat-forward meals.
